dict.acceptation: 美好的，愉快的；正派的；友好的，亲切的；细致的；

sent.orig: NICE has not recommended inhaled insulin for the routine treatment of type 1 or 2 diabetes.
sent.trans: NICE对1型或2型糖尿病患者并不推荐吸入型胰岛素作为常规治疗。

sent.orig: Nice pass, nice shot, nice fight!
sent.trans: 漂亮的传球，漂亮的射门，漂亮的扑救！

sent.orig: The Superior National Forest was nice, real nice.
sent.trans: 苏必利尔国家森林风光宜人，的确很宜人。

sent.orig: My room was nice, it was clean, had a nice telly and a safe.
sent.trans: 我的房间很好看，洁净，有一个电视机和保险箱。

sent.orig: It was nice to score for my confidence and nice get 80 minutes under my belt.
sent.trans: 进球很好，对我的自信心有帮助，而且能踢完80分钟的比赛，我感到很兴奋。
